## areSelectedAllOnPage() function

Gets indication whether are all currently displayed items on page selected or not, works with DataResponse DataLoader

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function areSelectedAllOnPage<TItem>(predicate?: (item: TItem) => boolean): GridFunction<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  predicate | <code>(item: TItem) =&gt; boolean</code> | Predicate that is evaluated whether row item falls into condition which allows selection/deselection of all items on page |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GridFunction<boolean>`
